data.title: Shahid Kapoor To Star In A Film Based On Mahabharata
data.meta_description: Discover the latest updates on Shahid Kapoor's upcoming Mahabharata film. Dive into the epic tale with our exclusive insights. Stay tuned for an unforgettable cinematic journey!
data.text:
Shahid Kapoor who has been riding the success waves of his OTT films is making a comeback on screen and is now filming a mythological film. Shahid is also working on an untitled film with Kriti Sanon which will be released next year. Shahid Kapoor joins hands with Vashu Bhagnani and is now going to feature in an epic mythological film.

According to Pinkvilla, Shahid Kapoor is teaming up with Pooja Entertainment for a grand mythological epic based on the Mahabharata, promising a VFX-filled spectacle of epic proportions. This film is reportedly directed by a South filmmaker who is not yet revealed but this project is set to be a big-scale film. According to the Pinkvilla report, preparations have already begun. This is what the source said…

It’s the most ambitious project for Vashu and Jackky Bhagnani. They have been developing this project since early this year and are determined to create a visual spectacle that Indian audiences have never seen before. Shahid has been their first and only choice since the inception of this project, and he’s already signed on for it. The movie is a technologically advanced project that promises to transport audiences to a never-before-explored world
